Ingredients.1: 1 pound cooked jumbo lump crabmeat, drained and picked over for shells

Ingredients.5: 0.5 teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Directions.2: Gently fold crabmeat, mayonnaise, bread crumbs, mustard, and seafood seasoning together in a large bowl, being careful not to overshred crabmeat. Season with salt and pepper. Gently fold in egg. Form mixture into 4 large patties and place on a baking sheet.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
